verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become עֵץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- tree הַגֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> hag-Ge-fen What is the vine מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol any עֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz; more than any tree הַזְּמוֹרָ֕ה <S%H2156><s%> haz-ze-mo-Rah [or than] a branch אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah is among בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> ba-'a-Tzei which is among the trees הַיָּֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> hai-Ya-'ar. comb

הֲיֻקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> ha-yuk-Kach be taken מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu Can עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz, Shall wood לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot thereof to do לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> lim-la-Chah; anything אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or יִקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Chu can take מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at יָתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> ya-Ted, a pin לִתְל֥וֹת <S%H8518><s%> lit-Lot of it to hang עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any כֶּֽלִי׃ <S%H3627><s%> Ke-li. any vessel

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh If לָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> la-'Esh into the fire נִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> nit-Tan Behold it is cast לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah for fuel אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei both קְצוֹתָ֜יו <S%H7098><s%> ke-tzo-Tav the ends אָכְלָ֤ה <S%H398><s%> 'a-che-Lah devoureth הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh the fire וְתוֹכ֣וֹ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cho of it and the midst נָחָ֔ר <S%H2787><s%> na-Char, of it is burned הֲיִצְלַ֖ח <S%H6743><s%> ha-yitz-Lach Is it meet לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> lim-la-Chah. business

הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בִּֽהְיוֹת֣וֹ <S%H1961><s%> bih-yo-To become תָמִ֔ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim, Behold when it was whole לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh it was meet לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> lim-la-Chah; for no work אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> 'af How כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh when the fire אֲכָלַ֙תְהוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> 'a-cha-Lat-hu hath devoured וַיֵּחָ֔ר <S%H2787><s%> vai-ye-Char, it and it is burned וְנַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-na-'a-Sah how much less shall it be meet ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> lim-la-Chah. yet for [any] work ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which עֵץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- tree הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> hag-Ge-fen As the vine בְּעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> be-'Etz among the trees הַיַּ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> hai-Ya-'ar, of the forest אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נְתַתִּ֥יו <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tiv which I have given לָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> la-'Esh to the fire לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah for fuel כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so נָתַ֔תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti, so will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, מֵהָאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> me-ha-'Esh from [one] fire יָצָ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza-'u, against them they shall go out וְהָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ve-ha-'Esh and [another] fire תֹּֽאכְלֵ֑ם <S%H398><s%> toch-Lem; shall devour וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem them and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God בְּשׂוּמִ֥י <S%H7760><s%> be-su-Mi when I set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בָּהֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> ba-Hem.

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land שְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah; desolate יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because מָ֣עֲלוּ <S%H4603><s%> Ma-'a-lu because they have committed מַ֔עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al, a trespass נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh
